topics.body:
"@ParagonCommander":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/547ce4f2636872135e840000#post_547ce4f2636872135e840000
I'm lucky; I straight up don't need to exercise at all to remain fit.

:\
I really am a genetic jackpot millionaire aren't I?
My family has no history of any genetic diseases, no history of heart disease, cancer, alzheimers, no history of genetically linked mental problems, don't need to exercise, have low cholesterol despite whenever I eat junk food, my family ages extremely slowly and we live to like at least a hundred years old to the point we look like we're 50 when we're 100 and it turns out I *might* have the genetic mutation to allow me to sleep for far less than most people.
FUCK YEAH EVOLUTION!

The only physical problems I have is that I might have ashtma, near sided and ~60% hearing.

he captures the Shobijin who control Mothra
and is using mothra to threaten and destroy all the crime rings business
so you know
cause mass destruction and kill probably hundreds, if not thousands of people in order to stop the crime ring

fucking
IDIOT
